name: cpmd_general
description: meta info used by the CPMD parser, all names are expected to start with x_cpmd_

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_atom_kind_label
metaInfos.description: The label of the atomic kind.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_atom_kind_mass
metaInfos.description: The mass of the atomic kind.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_atom_kind_nlcc
metaInfos.description: The nonlinear core correction (NLCC) of the atomic kind.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_atom_kind_pseudopotential_l
metaInfos.description: The angular part of the pseudopotential for the atomic kind.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_atom_kind_pseudopotential_type
metaInfos.description: The type of the pseudopotential for the atomic kind.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_atom_kind_raggio
metaInfos.description: The width of the ionic charge distribution (RAGGIO) of the atomic kind.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_cell_dimension
metaInfos.description: The cell dimension.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_cell_lattice_constant
metaInfos.description: The cell lattice constant.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_cell_symmetry
metaInfos.description: The symmetry of the cell.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_cell_volume
metaInfos.description: The cell volume.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_classical_energy_mean
metaInfos.description: The mean classical energy.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_classical_energy_std
metaInfos.description: The standard deviation of classical energy.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_compilation_date
metaInfos.description: CPMD compilation date.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_conserved_energy_mean
metaInfos.description: The mean conserved energy.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_conserved_energy_std
metaInfos.description: The standard deviation of conserved energy.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_constraints_energy_mean
metaInfos.description: The mean constrains energy.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_constraints_energy_std
metaInfos.description: The standard deviation of constraints energy.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_cpu_time_mean
metaInfos.description: The mean cpu time.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_density_cutoff
metaInfos.description: Place wave cutoff energy for density.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_density_functional_energy_mean
metaInfos.description: The mean density functional energy.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_density_functional_energy_std
metaInfos.description: The standard deviation of density functional energy.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_electron_kinetic_energy_mean
metaInfos.description: The mean electron kinetic energy.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_electron_kinetic_energy_std
metaInfos.description: The standard deviation of electron kinetic energy.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_geo_opt_initialization_time
metaInfos.description: Time for initialization.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_geo_opt_method
metaInfos.description: The geometry optimization method.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_geo_opt_scf_cnorm
metaInfos.description: Average of the off-diagonal components (CNORM) during SCF step within geometry optimization step.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_geo_opt_scf_detot
metaInfos.description: The difference in total energy to the previous SCF energy (DETOT) within geometry optimization step.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_geo_opt_scf_etot
metaInfos.description: The total energy (ETOT) during SCF step within geometry optimization step.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_geo_opt_scf_gemax
metaInfos.description: Largest off-diagonal component (GEMAX) during SCF step within geometry optimization step.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_geo_opt_scf_nfi
metaInfos.description: The scf step number (NFI) within geometry optimization step.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_geo_opt_scf_tcpu
metaInfos.description: The CPU time used during SCF step (TCPU) within geometry optimization step.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_geo_opt_step_cnstr
metaInfos.description: The largest absolute component of a constraint force on the atoms (CNSTR).

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_geo_opt_step_detot
metaInfos.description: The difference in total energy to the previous geometry optimization step (DETOT).

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_geo_opt_step_etot
metaInfos.description: The total energy at the end of a geometry optimization step (ETOT).

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_geo_opt_step_forces
metaInfos.description: The forces from a geometry optimization step. The ith row corresponds to the force for atom number i.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_geo_opt_step_gnmax
metaInfos.description: The largest absolute component of the force on any atom (GNMAX).

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_geo_opt_step_gnorm
metaInfos.description: Average force on the atoms (GNORM).

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_geo_opt_step_number
metaInfos.description: Geometry optimization step number.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_geo_opt_step_positions
metaInfos.description: The positions from a geometry optimization step. The ith row corresponds to the position for atom number i.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_geo_opt_step_tcpu
metaInfos.description: The CPU time used during geometry optimization step (TCPU).

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_geo_opt_step_total_number_of_scf_steps
metaInfos.description: Total number of SCF steps at the end of this geometry optimization step.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_initialized_forces
metaInfos.description: The initialized forces for geometry optimization. The ith row corresponds to the force for atom number i.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_initialized_positions
metaInfos.description: The initialized positions for geometry optimization. The ith row corresponds to the position for atom number i.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_input_filename
metaInfos.description: CPMD input file name.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_ion_displacement_mean
metaInfos.description: The mean ion displacement.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_ion_displacement_std
metaInfos.description: The standard deviation of ion displacement.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_ion_temperature_control
metaInfos.description: The temperature control method for ion dynamics.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_ionic_temperature_mean
metaInfos.description: The mean ionic temperature.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_ionic_temperature_std
metaInfos.description: The standard deviation of ionic temperature.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_lattice_vector_a1
metaInfos.description: Lattice vector A1

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_lattice_vector_a2
metaInfos.description: Lattice vector A2

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_lattice_vector_a3
metaInfos.description: Lattice vector A3

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_max_steps
metaInfos.description: The maximum number of steps requested. In MD, this is the number of MD steps, in single point calculations this is the number of scf cycles, in geometry optimization this is the number of optimization steps.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_nose_energy_electrons_mean
metaInfos.description: The mean Nosé energy for electrons.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_nose_energy_electrons_std
metaInfos.description: The standard deviation of Nosé energy for elctrons.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_nose_energy_ions_mean
metaInfos.description: The mean Nosé energy for ions.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_nose_energy_ions_std
metaInfos.description: The standard deviation of Nosé energy for ions.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_number_of_planewaves_density
metaInfos.description: Number of plane waves for density cutoff.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_number_of_planewaves_wave_function
metaInfos.description: Number of plane waves for wave_function cutoff.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_process_id
metaInfos.description: The process id for this calculation.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_real_space_mesh
metaInfos.description: Number of points in the real space mesh.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_reciprocal_lattice_vector_b1
metaInfos.description: Reciprocal lattice vector B1

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_reciprocal_lattice_vector_b2
metaInfos.description: Reciprocal lattice vector B2

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_reciprocal_lattice_vector_b3
metaInfos.description: Reciprocal lattice vector B3

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_restraints_energy_mean
metaInfos.description: The mean restraints energy.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_restraints_energy_std
metaInfos.description: The standard deviation of restraints energy.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_run_host_name
metaInfos.description: The host on which this calculation was made on.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_run_user_name
metaInfos.description: The user who launched this calculation.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_scf_cnorm
metaInfos.description: Average of the off-diagonal components (CNORM) during SCF step.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_scf_detot
metaInfos.description: The difference in total energy to the previous SCF energy (DETOT).

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_scf_etot
metaInfos.description: The total energy (ETOT) during SCF step.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_scf_gemax
metaInfos.description: Largest off-diagonal component (GEMAX) during SCF step.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_scf_nfi
metaInfos.description: The scf step number (NFI).

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_scf_tcpu
metaInfos.description: The CPU time used during SCF step (TCPU).

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_section_atom_kind
metaInfos.description: Contains information about one atomic kind.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_section_atom_kinds
metaInfos.description: Contains information about the atomic kinds present in the calculation.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_section_end_information
metaInfos.description: Contains information printed at the end of a calculation.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_section_final_results
metaInfos.description: The final results after a single point calculation.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_section_geo_opt_initialization
metaInfos.description: Geometry optimization initialization information.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_section_geo_opt_scf_iteration
metaInfos.description: Contains information about the self-consistent field iteration within a geometry optimization step.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_section_geo_opt_step
metaInfos.description: Contains information for a single geometry optimization step.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_section_md_averaged_quantities
metaInfos.description: Averaged quantities from a MD calculation.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_section_md_initialization
metaInfos.description: Molecular dynamics initialization information.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_section_pseudopotential_information
metaInfos.description: Contains information about the pseudopotentials.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_section_run_type_information
metaInfos.description: Contains information about the run type.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_section_scf
metaInfos.description: Contains information about self-consistent field calculation

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_section_scf_iteration
metaInfos.description: Contains information about the self-consistent field iteration within a wavefunction optimization.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_section_start_information
metaInfos.description: Contains information about the starting conditions for this run

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_section_supercell
metaInfos.description: Contains information about the supercell.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_section_system_information
metaInfos.description: Contains information about the system.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_section_timing
metaInfos.description: Contains information about the timings.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_section_wave_function_initialization
metaInfos.description: Contains information about the wave function initialization

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_section_xc_information
metaInfos.description: Contains information about the exchange-correlation functional.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_start_datetime
metaInfos.description: CPMD run start time and date

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_time_step_electrons
metaInfos.description: The time step for electrons.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_time_step_ions
metaInfos.description: The time step for ions.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_total_number_of_molecular_structures
metaInfos.description: Total number of molecular structures.

metaInfos.name: x_cpmd_wave_function_cutoff
metaInfos.description: Place wave cutoff energy for wave function.
